summary:
NOVACORE Ecosystem - Our utilities tie together seamlessly, creating a cohesive whole, which enables uninterrupted commerce, ownership and wealth generation in real-time, ranging from buying land or real US goods within our high-resolution metaverse to earning passive income from owned land to offering full-scale incubation services to cryptocurrency projects and much, much more.

 NovaShip - E-commerce with cryptocurrencies and world-wide shipping.

 NovaEarth Metaverse - Monetizing Digital Properties with NovaCore's Visionary Platform.

 NovaLaunch - Launch pad and project incubator for a new form of marketing and client acquisition.
